description: The student, in consultation with the lecturer, will work out a programme of study which will include topics, readings, fieldwork if relevant, and assignments for the module. A formal, written agreement is to be drawn up, giving a clear account of the learning objectives and programme of study and other pertinent details. Head of Department, Program Director’s and Academic Advisor’s approval of the written agreement is required. Regular meetings and reports are expected. Evaluation criteria may comprise both continuous and/or and final assessment, the % distribution of which will be worked out between the student and the lecturer prior to seeking departmental approval.
title: Independent Study in Epidemiology and Disease Control
